headings.usage: Main headings (h1, h2, h3). Use for emotional impact.

body.usage: Body text, UI elements, buttons, inputs.

primary.description: Deep Forest Green - Trust, Nature, Professionalism

secondary.description: Warm Beige - Softness, Backgrounds, Secondary Actions

accent.description: Soft Bronze/Gold - Highlights, CTAs, Premium feel

background.description: Bone White - Warmer than pure white, easier on eyes

foreground.description: Soft Black - High contrast but not harsh

muted.description: Light Stone - Borders, dividers, disabled states

spacing.base_scale: Use 2-3x standard Tailwind spacing (e.g., p-8 instead of p-4)

grids.marketing: Mode A (Tetris Grid) - Asymmetric, overlapping elements.
grids.dashboard: Mode B (High Density) - grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Tight gaps (gap-6).
grids.booking_flow: Single column centered (max-w-md) for focus, or split screen (Service List | Summary) on desktop.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white rounded-full px-6 py-4 font-medium

cards.style: bg-card border border-muted shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl p-6

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-muted focus:border-primary rounded-none px-0 py-3 focus:ring-0 transition-colors placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

navigation.style: backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80 border-b border-muted/50 sticky top-0 z-50

hero_bg.alt: Modern salon interior with warm lighting
hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background or main visual

decorative_plant.usage: Decorative element in empty states or 404 pages

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance. Use 'primary' color.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #1A1A1A on light backgrounds. Use #2C4A3B for large text only.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent: UPDATE TAILWIND: Configure the colors in tailwind.config.js to match the palette above.
USE SHADCN: Use Shadcn components but OVERRIDE the default styles to match the 'Organic & Earthy' aesthetic (rounded-xl, warm colors).
NO DEFAULT BLUE: Do not use the default blue color. Use the Forest Green (#2C4A3B) as the primary brand color.
LOGIN PAGE: Make it simple. Centered card on a split background (Image Left / Form Right).
DASHBOARD: Keep it clean. White cards on the Bone White background. Use the 'High Density' grid.
BOOKING FLOW: Focus on the user journey. Step 1: Service, Step 2: Staff, Step 3: Time. Don't overwhelm the user.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - generic, centered, blue/gray designs.
Micro-animations are mandatory for all interactions.
